Abo bagore 25 bahawe moto zikoresha amashanyarazi, mu rwego rwo kwirinda guhumanya ikirere, cyane ko ari zo ziri gutangwa muri ibi bihe mu rwego rwo kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Muri iyi gahunda yo gufasha abagore byâ€™umwihariko kubateza imbere no kubafasha mu bikorwa bitandukanye binyuze mu kubaha moto biteganyijwe ko nibura abazazihabwa b

re ari inkingi yâ€™imibereho yâ€™umuturage, umuryango ndetse nâ€™Igihuguâ€.
Yongeyeho ati â€œMu kubafasha kuva mu mirimo itanakurikije amategeko, itanabahesha icyubahiro, kuko hari abagore bajya mu buzunguzayi, ariko iyo umweretse ko ashobora kwiga gukanika kuko ntabwo baziga gutwara moto gusa biga no kuzikanika arabyishimira. Turita cyane kandi mu gukoresha ibinyabiziga bitangiza ibidukikijeâ€.
Abahawe moto bavuga ko kuba baratekerejweho bakumva ko bagomba kubateza imbere nkâ€™abagore byâ€™umwihariko, bibere
... (891 chars skipped) ...
bumenyi no kubaha ibikoresho, mu rwego rwo kubafasha kumenya uko bakorera amafaranga, bakanizigamira, bakazaba ba rwiyemezamirimo bato, bashobora kwifasha badashingiye gusa ku mugaboâ€.
Binyuze muri iyi gahunda biteganyijwe ko izagera ku bagore bagera ku 2000, bari mu bice bitandukanye byâ€™Igihugu, birimo Akarere ka Bugesera, Musanze, Huye, Rusizi, na Rubavu.
Abagore bafashwa ahanini ni abapfakazi, imfubyi, abagore batandukanye nâ€™abagabo babo, abacikirije amashuri ndetse nâ€™abandi badafite amikoro.

14 NZERI 2016
TURUKIMENISITANI
Ku itariki ya 30 Kamena 2016 abapolisi bafashe Mansur Masharipov, bamufatira mu mugi wa Ashgabad muri Turukimenisitani. Kuva mu mpeshyi yo mu mwaka wa 2014, abapolisi bagenzuraga ibikorwa bye kubera ko akora umurimo wo kubwiriza kandi akifatanya mu materaniro yâ€™Abahamya ba Yehova. Masharipov ufite imyaka 32, ashinjwa guhohotera umupolisi kandi abapolisi ari bo bamuhohoteye. Na mbere yaho bari baramuhohoteye kandi bamukorera ibikorwa byâ€™iyicarubozo. Ku itariki ya 18 Kanama 2016, urukiko rwo muri Turukimenisitani rwamukatiye igifungo cyâ€™umwaka umwe. Icyakora Masharipov yajuririye uwo mwanzuro.

Muri Gicurasi 2021, Ellen DeGeneres yatangarije abamukurikira ko nyuma yâ€™imyaka 19 agiye gusezera akazi ko kuba Umuyobozi wâ€™Ikiganiro cya Ellen Show yakoraga. Byabaye impamo tariki 26 Gicurasi 2022.
Mu byo yavuze ko agiye gukora no kwibandaho nyuma yo kurangiza ikiganiro cye, harimo gufungura ku mugaragaro Ellen DeGeneres Campus of the Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund.
Ati â€œNi ikigo kigezweho ku bashakashatsi hirya no hino mu guteza imbere ibungabungwa ryâ€™ingagi nâ€™ubukerarugendo.â€
Akoresheje urubuga rwe
... (14 chars skipped) ... 
mu cyumweru gishize, Ellen yavuze ko afite amatsiko menshi yo kongera kuba mu Rwanda agasura iki kigo.
Yanditse ati â€œUbwo ikiganiro cyarangiye mfite amatsiko menshi yo kongera kujya kureba mu Rwanda impano ya mbere nziza mu mateka.â€
Bivugwa ko ubwo ikiganiro cye cyarangiye ashobora kumara igihe kirekire mu Rwanda.
The Hollywood Reporter yatangaje ko Ellen yaba afite gahunda zo gutura mu Rwanda.
Ellen yagize ati â€œTuri gutekereza gushaka inzu tukimukirayo tukamara igihe kirekire mu Rwanda kuko aba
... (14 chars skipped) ...
eza kandi buje urugwiro.â€
Iki kigo cyubatse mu Karere ka Musanze.

Abacururiza ndetse nâ€™abatuye umujyi wa Rwamagana barishimira ko noneho isoko rigezweho ryâ€™umujyi ryatangiye kubakwa ariko bagasaba ko imirimo yo kuryubaka yakihutishwa, ntibizabe nkâ€™aho bakunze kumva ngo igikorwaremezo cyaradindiye.
Umujyi wa Rwamagana ni umwe mu mijyi izwi cyane mu gihugu bitewe nâ€™uko uri mu yabayeho mbere ndetse magingo aya akaba ari umwe mu mijyi itatu yâ€™aho umujyi wa 
... (527 chars skipped) ... 
abantu benshi barigana baturutse impande n'impande kuko isoko ryiza ribona n'abantu benshi bagiye batandukanye baturutse no mutundi turere bitewe nuko ari isoko rya kijyambere kandi rigezweho".
Gusa nâ€™ubwo imirimo yo kubaka isoko rigezweho ryâ€™umujyi wa Rwamagana yatangiye, abaturage bo barasaba ko yakihutishwa, ntibizabe nkâ€™aho bajya bumva ngo igikorwaremezo kimaze imyaka nâ€™imyaniko cyubakwa ariko nticyuzura.
Kuri iyi ngingo yo kwihutisha ibikorwa byo kubaka isoko rigezweho ryâ€™umujyi wa Rwamagan
... (527 chars skipped) ...
a guhita rikora ntabwo tuzarindira ibindi byiciro".
Mu gihe hari kubakwa isoko rigezweho ryâ€™umujyi wa Rwamagana, abahacururizaga bahise bimurirwa ku gakiriro ka Rwamagana.
Biteganyijwe ko isoko rishya rizubakwa mu byiciro bitatu, aho mu kiciro cya mbere hazubakwa inzu yâ€™isoko nyirizina igeretse kabiri, icyiciro cya kabiri nâ€™icyagatatu hakazubakwa inzu zâ€™ubucuruzi ku ruhande. Ibyo byiciro byose bikazatwara miliyari 10.5 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.

Iki gitaramo gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Convention Center, uretse Anne Kansiime wo muri Uganda na Mammito wo muri Kenya, cyanatumiwemo abandi banyarwenya bo mu Rwanda nka Herve Kimenyi, Rusine, Babu na Fally Merci uri kubitegura.
Fally Merci uri gutegura iki gitaramo yabwiye IGIHE ko iki kiganiro gifite umwihariko wo gususurutsa abitabiriye inama ya Youth Connect.
Ati â€œNi igitaramo kitari mubyo dusanzwe dutegura cyane ko iki ari icyo gususurutsa abitabiriye inama ya Youth Connekt imaze iminsi iri kubera i Kigali.â€
Umunyarwenya Anne Kansiime aheruka i Kigali ubwo yari yitabiriye igitaramo cya Seka Live cyabaye ku wa 24 Nzeri 2023 muri Camp Kigali.
Mammito ubusanzwe witwa Eunice Wanjiru Njoki yavutse mu 1993 yatangiye umwuga wo gusetsa kuva mu 2015 .

Hano hari ibitekerezo byinshi byubuhanga muri Warcraft 3, kandi kubakinnyi bashaka gukemura urugamba vuba, amayeri atandukanye ya Rush ntagushidikanya.Mu mayeri menshi ya Rush, iyihebye cyane ni TR ikabije ya Homo sapiens.Nyuma yo gusobanukirwa amayeri menshi ya Terran ya kera cyane, ntabwo bigoye kubona ko intwari ikoreshwa cyane nabakinnyi ba Terran kandi ifite intsinzi nini muriyi sisitemu ya tactique ntabwo ari Armage amoko yose ashaka kugira, ahubwo ni intwari itabogamye. Mwami.Iki gihe, reka tuvuge impamvu Ultimate TR ya Terrans ihitamo Fire Demons hejuru yintwari nka Archmage, Beast King cyangwa TK.
Nka tactique yubuzima-nurupfu Rush, TR ikabije ikina byihuse, byukuri kandi byubugome, ikoresha imbaraga zisumba izindi gutsinda abanzi mbere yuko badashobora gutegura neza kwirwanaho.Nukuri kubwibi, mugitabo cyumupaka TR, igihe cyo kugaragara kwintwari, kurwana hakiri kare ni ngombwa.Nkuko bigenda, umudayimoni wumuriro ubwayo nintwari ikomeye cyane mugihe cyambere, tutibagiwe ko umudayimoni muto wahamagawe ashobora kuzamura cyane ubushobozi bwo gusohora nyuma yo gutandukana.Mubyongeyeho, urugo rukabije rwa TR rukeneye gukusanya inyubako nyinshi, intwari zidafite aho zibogamiye zizagaragara mugitondo kuruta igicaniro cyahamagawe mugitondo, abadayimoni bazimya hamwe na tactique ya TR birahuye nuburyo bwa tactique, abakinnyi bakoresha inshuro kandi intsinzi ni nanone gushyira mu gaciro.
Igihe cyo kohereza: Ukuboza-21-2021

Farumasi Gukata Edge ni farumasi itanga ibijyanye nâ€™ibitaro bikuru bituranye bya Daiichi biri mu mujyi wa Himeji, mu Buyapani. Muri ubu bwoko bwa farumasi umukiriya ntabwo afite uburenganzira bwo kubona ibicuruzwa nko muburyo bwo gucuruza; ahubwo imiti ye izategurwa inyuma yumufarumasiye nyuma yo kwerekana imiti. Izina ry'umushinga : The Cutting Edge, Izina ryabashushanya : Tetsuya Matsumoto, Izina ry'abakiriya : Eri Matsuura Himeji Daiichi Hospital.
Iki gishushanyo cyiza nuwatsindiye igihembo cya zahabu mugihe cyo kumurika ibicuruzwa no kumurika imishinga yo gushushanya. Ugomba rwose kubona ibihembo bya zahabu byatsindiye abashushanya ibishushanyo mbonera kugirango uvumbure ibindi byinshi bishya, bishya, byumwimerere kandi bihanga ibicuruzwa byo kumurika nibikorwa byo gushushanya imishinga.

Guca imyeyo ni igikorwa cyakorwaga mu muco nyarwanda ndetse kigakorwa n'abakobwa. Ese haba hari ingaruka zo gukora cyangwa kudakora iki gikorwa? Benshi ntibakivugaho rumwe ariko twegereye umuvuzi ukoresha ibimera Mugwiza atumara amatsiko ku bijyanye n'iki gikorwa, uko gikorwa, abagikora, igihe gikorerwa n'icyo kimaze.
Kubera ko guca imyeyo ubusanzwe byakorwaga n'abantu bo hambere usanga uyu munsi iki gikorwa kitavugwaho rumwe, buri wese ubyumvishe abifata uko ashaka, habaho abakigaya n'abavuga ko ari igikorwa cyiza ku bashakanye.
Mugwiza Gerry usanzwe avura akoresheje ibirungo byo mu biryo ndetse agatanga n'iminti gakondo, azwiho ku gufasha abantu guca imyeyo uko baba bangana kose.
Aha rero aramara amatsiko abantu aho avuga ko guca imyeyo ari byiza cyane ariko kandi anavuga ko atari byiza kubikora ukiri muto kuko ushobora kuzashaka umugabo utabikunda bikakubera ikibazo. Ati "Rero ibyiza ni ukubikora waramaze kumenya niba uwo mugiye kubana abikunda kuko byaba ari ikibazo ubimwimye kandi abikunda."

Muvandimwe Rugabira Dan:
Mwiriwe ho? Reka ngaruke gato kubyo nigeze kwandika. Muby'ukuri, igihe njye
nandikaga ntabwo nitaye ku byari muri document Samuel yohereje. Yewe ndumva
ntaranayisoma yose. Ahubwo nahereye kuri bike nsanzwe nzi kuri Joel Osteen
n'abandi bagiye gusa nawe. Yewe nakurikiye ibyigisho bye bitagira umubare. Njye
ntawe ncira urubanza. Gusa njye navugaga ko imyigishirize ye ivugako abakirisito
bazabona ubutunzi bwo mu isi ntaho bihuriye n'ibyo ijambo ry'Imana rivuga. Kuba
ufite ibintu ntibisobanura ko uri umukristo. Ashwi da! Twibuke ko ivubira
n'ababi. Ahubwo ubanza ababi ijya inabarundira. Ikabaha n'inyongezo. Kuba
bababararundiwe ntibihagije kwemeza ko wahawe imigisha. Imigisha "ne sont pas
toujours quantifiables".
Ahubwo iyo ushishoze neza, usanga Bibiliya bigisha arinayo ibagwa nabi. Niyo
yonyine ibashinja ubuyobe. N'aho ubundi, bisa naho no mu ntama zazimiye hazavamo
abakizwa.Ariko abayobya intama z'Umwami bazakubitwa inkoni nyinshi!
Mukomere rero.
S. Maniraguha

Ibinyobwa bidasanzwe bifasha mu kugira ubuzima bwiza
Tumenyereye kunywa imitobe itandukanye yâ€™imbuto ngo tugire ubuzima bwiza. Nubwo ari byiza, hari nâ€™ibindi binyobwa bigirira umubiri akamaro gakomeye bidakunze gukoreshwa. Dore bimwe muri ibyo binyobwa:
Hibiscus :
Hibiscus ni indabyo zumye. Igabanya umuvuduko ukabije wa maraso, ikize kubirinda indwara (anti-oxidants), agabanya ibinure bibi (cholesterol),ikize kuri vitamin C, Yongera imbaraga, ifasha umwijima gukora neza, irinda cancer, igabanya stress cyane, ituma igogora rigenda neza, irwanya constipation. Uyishyira mu mazi ashyushye nkukora icyayi ugategereza iminota micye amazi agahinduka umutuku. Ushobora no kuyikoramo umutobe.
Amakara :
Amakara ni ifu yâ€™amakara amakara asukura mu mubiri (detoxifying), Akiza kugubwa nabi munda (digestion disorder), Akura uburozi budakomeye mu mara (intestinal parasites), agabanya ibinure bibi (cholesterol) mu maraso, arinda cancer nâ€™indwara zâ€™umutima. Uvanga nkeya mu mazi hanyuma ukanywesha umuheha kugira ngo utanduza amenyo.
Ibumba ryâ€™Icyatsi:
Ibumba ryâ€™Icyatsi iba ari puderi, ikoreshwa ibintu byinshi bitandukanye, yaba kuyinywa cyangwa ku ruhu. Ivura indwara zimwe na zimwe wareba hano , ni nziza ku bagore batwite , ikoreshwa mu kugira uruhu rwiza, ndetse kuvura imvuvu zâ€™imisatsi.

Yohani wâ€™Imana yavukiye mu gihugu cya Portugali ahitwa ontemoronovo. Ababyeyi be bari bakennye ariko bakaba abakristu beza. Aho aviriye mu gisirikare, ntiyiriwe asubira iwabo, ahubwo yagerageje gucuruza ibitabo nâ€™utundi tuntu ngo yirwaneho. Kugira ngo abone ibitunga abarwayi, yitanze ijoro nâ€™umunsi kandi agasabiriza imfashanyo hirya no hino. Muri uko kwitangira abarwayi, yashinze umuryango wâ€™Abafurere wita ku barwayi; abaha urugero rwiza kandi abamenyereza kwitagatifuza. Yohani wâ€™Imana yitabye Imana tariki 8 Werurwe 1550; ashyirwa mu rwego rwâ€™Abatagatifu mu mwaka wâ€™1690.

Umusozo

Isubiramo rya CMEF --- tuzakubona ubutaha !!
Imurikagurisha ryubuvuzi rya 2021 rya Shenzhen CMEF ryizihije neza, Pro-med nkumushinga wa IVD na POCT, wibanda kubuzima bwabana ba materal imyaka myinshi.
Iki gihe, Pro-med izana ibicuruzwa byinshi byingenzi mumurikagurisha rya CMEF, cyane cyane kumashini ya gaze yamaraso - ibicuruzwa byihariye bya Pro-med, bizagumana ubushyuhe bwamaraso mbere yo gupimwa kumashini ya gaze, birashobora kugenzura impamvu komeza ibisubizo mubihe byukuri.
Na none Pro-med yazanye abasesengura POCT mu buryo bwikora, gerageza amaraso y'urutoki ntakeneye guhinduka mugushakisha.
Isubiramo ryicyiciro cya Pro-med.
Igihe cyo kohereza: Mutarama-21-2022

Yidu Chilli irahingwa kandi igahingwa mu burengerazuba bw'Intara ya Hubei, ikanyunyuza ikirere cyiza cy'Ubushinwa kugira ngo duhindure ibyo dukeka ko ari chili y'umwimerere yo muri Megizike mo flavoursome ubushyuhe buke butukura bwa cayenne.
Irashobora gukoreshwa nkizindi chili itukura, muri stew, Igitaliyani, Igishinwa, Tayilande, Mexico ndetse nibindi byinshi, uburyohe bwayo bwiza.
Bitumizwa mu mirima izwi twizeza ko chili nini izongeramo ubundi buryohe kubiryo byawe.
Yidu Chili ni primaire ya chili pepper itanga uburyo budasanzwe bwo guhumura, ubushyuhe, nibara.Ibicuruzwa byinshi nibyiza gukoreshwa muburyo butandukanye bwibiryo, ukongeramo uburyohe bwihariye nimpumuro nziza mubyo waremye.Yidu Chili yacu iratunganye kubakunda ibiryo birimo ibirungo kandi bifuza ikintu cyiza kandi cyiza.

Perezida wa Forum yâ€™amadini mu Karere ka Gatsibo Mukarage Philbert
Kurandura burundu ibiyobyabwenge no kuba Umujyanama ku bijyanye nâ€™imigendekere myiza ya gahunda yo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenjye mu Karere ka Gatsibo, nibyo byasabwe abayobozi nâ€™abagize Forum yâ€™amatorero nâ€™amadini mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Mu nama yâ€™umunsi umwe yabaye kuri uyu wa 11 Nyakanga uyu mwaka wa 2013, uhagarariye Forum yâ€™Amadini mu Karere ka Gatsibo Pasiteri Mukarage Philbert yasobanuye ibyiza byo gukorera hamwe hunguranwa nâ€™ibitekerezo ku mikorere ya Forum muri rusange.
Pasiteri Mukarage yongeye kandi kwibutswa abari bitabiriye inama, inshingano 7 bagejejweho nâ€™umuyobozi wâ€™Akarere ka Gatsibo, mu nama yaherukaga kuba kuwa mbere tariki ya 10 Kamena 2013.
Muri izo nshingano harimo; gushishikariza abayoboke babo umumaro wo gufatana urunana mu kwiyubakira Akarere, gucengeza mu miryango imitekerereza mizima ituma bamererwa neza, batera imbere kandi bateza imbere Akarere, gusenga cyane, gukora cyane hagamijwe iterambere no guhuza abaturage haharanirwa imibereho myiza, Ubuzima, Uburezi, ishoramari, kwigira ngo kuko byuba Akarere.
Inama yarangiye inteko rusange yemeje igenamigambi rya Forum yâ€™amadini mu iterambere ryâ€™Akarere Nyakanga 2013-Kamena 2014, abitabiriye inama bakaba bashimiye ubuyobozi bwâ€™Akarere kuba bwarabahaye inshingano ndetse bakungurana ibitekerezo ku mikorere nâ€™imikoranire hagati yâ€™amadini nâ€™amatorero mu kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.

Tanzania: Umunyeshuri wigaga mu mwaka wa gatatu w'amashuri yisumbuye, yiyahuye nyuma yaho ababyeyi bamwohereje kujya kwiga ku kigo adashaka
Uyu munyeshuri witwa
Jafari Mwashitete uri mu kigero ki imyaka 16, basanze yiyahuye aho bikekwa byaturutse ku babyeyi be bamwohereje kujya kwiga ku kigo kitwa Lumbira, mu gihe we yashakaga kwiga ku kigo kitwa
Myovizi.
Amakuru y'urupfu rw'uyu munyeshuri rwemejwe na ACP Theopista Mallya, Umuyobozi wa Polisi mu intara ya Songwe, wavuze ko Jafari basanze yapfuye afite urwandiko mu mu fuko w'ipantaro rwanditseho ko, icyatumye yiyahura byaturutse kuba ababyeyi be baramuhatiye kujya kwiga ku kigo adashaka bigatuma yiyahura.
ACP Theopista Mallya, yasabye ababyeyi kujya baganiriza abana babo bakuburyo bajya babatega amatwi bakumva ibibazo bafite aho kugira ngo babahatire ku bashyiramo ibyo bashaka gusa.
Uyu munyeshuri yitabye Imana tariki ya 3 Nyakanga 2023
